description.title: TPS: key storage, configurable number of external concurrent clients
description.purpose: The test uses four clients to perform the bulk loading of transactions into the network concurrently, where transactions are setting a key value pair in the KeyStorage contract. This the test is similar to ten_per_004 though rather than perform funds transfer, the transactions are a contract function call. This allows us to see if the TPS varies depending on the transaction type (funds transfer vs contract call).
